description: Create an incident unit of measure quantity
permissions: User must be authorized to create the related incident per IncidentPolicy (or be an admin), as IncidentUnitOfMeasureQuantity permissions defer to the incident policy.
side_effects: Creates an incident unit of measure quantity and touches the associated tender_job_schedule_shift and job_production_plan after commit.
validation_notes: Required flags: --incident-type, --incident-id, --unit-of-measure, --quantity. quantity must be numeric. incident and unit_of_measure relationships are required.

flags.name: --incident-type
flags.description: Incident type (use incidents for standard incident records)
